name: Lunar Looping Legend
description:
Your spaceship is stranded in lunar orbit inside an astroid field. away from your space stration. You only have 10 seconds of burn time left to adjust your relative speed.
it is not enough to reach the space station on your own, so you have to use the gravitational pull of nearby astroids to assist you.

Controls:
W - Fire boosters forward.
S - Fire boosters backwards.
A - Fire boosters to the right.
D - Fire boosters to the left.
SPACE - Fire boosters up.
Left CTRL - Fire boosters down.
Q - Roll your spaceship counter-clockwise.
E - Roll your spaceship clockwise.
TAB - Toggle focus to the nearest astroid.
Esc - Pause the game.

This game as well as most of the assets were made in 3 days for the 130th  mini jam with the theme "Lunar" hosted by  ZahranW and KingW.
